Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Despite some organizational hiccups, Construct Lucia passed all the required assessments.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technician', 3: 'Do you mean to send her into combat, sir?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: "That carries certain risks, sir. I'm sure with more observation...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "We will never get real data if we don't deploy her. The Purifying Force exists for that exact eventuality.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Understanding that Nikola had his mind set, the technician shakes her head and pulls up a selection of Military Construct files on the terminal.'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: "Understood. We're allocating new members to Gray Raven... Do you have any special considerations, sir?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'A support-type is a must, and also an armored one... no, Kurono leadership can decide on the second member.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: "Kurono? Why's that?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Just to be fair. They may have their own considerations on who to pair up with Lucia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Technician', 3: 'Understood. I will send the files to your office once the team members are confirmed.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Work fast.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'One day, in the halls of Babylonia'}
{3: 'It was an important day. I felt my body tense and seize multiple times, as if I were an old machine with outdated servos.'}
{3: 'It was all because of a message from Commandant several days prior.'}
{2: 'Command Central', 3: "After careful consideration from the Command Central, we have decided to replenish Gray Raven's ranks, and start preparations for combat operations."}
{3: 'Many more bureaucratic entries followed, but my attention was solely focused on the short, curt notice.'}
{3: 'Two reinforcing teammates were coming over, both with groundside combat experience. That is to say, we were combat-ready.'}
{3: 'I felt joy at the turn of events, but also worry about what Gray Raven would turn into.'}
{3: "—At least, I hoped history wouldn't repeat itself."}
{3: "Just daydreaming here did me no good. At Commandant's reminder, I opened the office door."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Two unfamiliar faces in the office turned towards me. Male, blue. Female, pink.'}
{3: 'I was at a loss for words, but such was the first impressions I had of my new teammates.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The male Construct noticed me, but made no visible response, coolly appraising his surroundings.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The female Construct, however, kept fidgeting, shifting her position and posture. Whenever our eyes locked, hers would inevitably lower as her face reddened.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Two individuals, clearly different from me, but bursting with personality.'}

{3: "Commandant did not speak, and neither did they. I knew the burden of breaking the silence fell on my shoulders. If I didn't, Gray Raven would never spread its wings, and our story would never start."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1502.jpg'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hello, my name is Lucia, frame designation BPL-01, Lotus, also the team leader of Gray Raven—'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I look forward to working with you!'}
{3: 'I felt my M.I.N.D. destabilize as I spoke the words, even though no harm had come to me. I recognized the emotion as "embarrassment," but I resolved to finish the sentence nonetheless.'}

{3: 'After the stiff greeting, I felt my respiration resume without realizing it had halted in the first place. As Commandant started clapping slowly in the doorway, I was reaffirmed that I had done the right thing.'}
{3: 'Swept along by the emotions swirling in the office, the two Constructs spoke up. The male took the lead.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'My name is Lee, frame designation BPN-06, Palefire.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'My original team... is not important. I have been assigned to Gray Raven. Dual guns are my weapons of choice.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I am equally adept at strategic planning and close combat.'}
{3: 'Lee, Palefire. The file identified him as an Attacker, same as me.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'My turn... um, my name is Liv, Support Construct.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I came from Egret... my preferred weapons are levitated weapons platforms. I look forward to working together.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What about your version?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh... I'm sorry, designation BPN-08, Eclipse."}
{3: 'Though a bit shy, Liv nonetheless finished her introduction.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Egret, I see... the team well-known for their meticulous strategy...'}
{3: 'Lee visibly fell into a short computational cycle, as if seizing on freshly-gathered intelligence.'}
{3: "It only served to exacerbate Liv's restlessness."}
{3: 'Lucia, Lee, and Liv.'}
{3: 'Those were our names.'}
{3: 'Lotus, Palefire, and Eclipse.'}
{3: 'The codenames given to our frames.'}
{3: 'Katanas, dual guns, and levitating cannons.'}
{3: 'The weapons we wielded.'}
{3: 'This was the new Gray Raven.'}
